texts.name: Stacia
texts.biography: Stacia used to hate unicorns, even feared them since she was a child. She left Vori and sailed across the ocean, to find a place without unicorns. While a storm destoryed her ship, she had to settle down in a mystical island. In this island, she found the nightmares can become their companion. Now she does not fear unicorns any longer.

specialty.description:
{Nightmares}

Increases Speed of any Nightmares or Shadowmares by 1 and their Attack and Defense skills by 5% for every 6 levels (rounded up).
specialty.name: Nightmares
